          <title>
            <string language="en">Refracted light along the normal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Refracted Licht entlang dem Normal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lumière réfractée le long de la normale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz refracted ao longo do normal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce refracted lungo il normale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαθλασμένο φως κατά μήκος του κανονικού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Luz refractada a lo largo del normal</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram compares the refracted light along the normal when light travels from water to air and when light travels from air to water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">angles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bending</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">boundaries</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">glasses</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">normal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plastics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm vergleicht das refracted Licht 
entlang dem Normal, wenn Licht von Wasser zu Luft reist und wenn Licht
von Luft zu Wasser reist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme compare la lumière réfractée
le long de la normale quand la lumière voyage de l'eau à l'air et 
quand la lumière voyage de l'air à l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama compara a luz refracted ao longo do 
normal quando a luz viaja da água ao ar e quando a luz viaja do ar à
água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema confronta la luce refracted lungo il
normale quando la luce viaggia da acqua ad aria e quando la luce 
viaggia da aria ad acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα συγκρίνει το διαθλασμένο φως κατά 
μήκος του κανονικού όταν ελαφριά ταξίδια από το ύδωρ με τον 
αέρα και όταν ελαφριά ταξίδια από τον αέρα στο ύδωρ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama compara la luz refractada a lo largo
del normal cuando la luz viaja del agua al aire y cuando la luz 
viaja del aire al agua.</string>
          </description>
